item.title: The Unified Electronic Contract will come into effect in January 2018 in the UAE
item.description:
Source: DED. Al Zaabi. Dubai Economy’s Commercial Compliance & Consumer Protection (CCCP) sector held a workshop for electronics businesses. The goal was to clarify the rules of the unified contract. Starting in 2018, this contract is required for selling or servicing electronic devices and components in the UAE. This Unified Electronic Contract combines sales, warranty, maintenance, and spare parts agreements into a single document. It became mandatory in early January 2018 and must detail the product, serial number, and purchase date...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-unified-electronic-contract-will-come-into-effect-in-january-2018-in-the-uae/
